trans-unit.source: Represents the context of a deployment step that is being executed while a SharePoint project is being deployed or retracted.
trans-unit.target: 表示当部署或撤消 SharePoint 项目时执行的部署步骤的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio passes <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentContext> to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.CanExecute%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.Execute%2A> methods of deployment steps.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 将传递<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentContext>到<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.CanExecute%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentStep.Execute%2A>的部署步骤的方法。

trans-unit.source: A new deployment context is initialized at the start of a deployment and retraction operation.
trans-unit.target: 在开始部署和收回操作初始化新的部署上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentContext> interface implements the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject> to enable deployment steps to store and pass data between steps.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentContext>接口实现<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject>以便部署步骤来存储和步骤之间传递数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the deployment was canceled by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取部署是否已被用户取消。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the deployment was canceled by the user; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果部署已被用户取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the project is being deployed.
trans-unit.target: 确定该项目是否正被部署。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the project is being deployed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在部署项目，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the project is being retracted.
trans-unit.target: 确定该项目是否正被收回。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the project is being retracted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在撤消项目，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access to the project logger.
trans-unit.target: 获取对项目记录器的访问。

trans-unit.source: The object representing a project logger.
trans-unit.target: 表示项目记录器的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access to the current project that is being deployed or retracted.
trans-unit.target: 获取对正在被部署或收回的当前项目的访问。

trans-unit.source: The current project that is being deployed or retracted.
trans-unit.target: 当前项目正被部署或收回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the canonical URL of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c> that the project is connected to, according to SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: 返回项目根据 SharePoint 连接到的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c> 的规范 URL。

trans-unit.source: The canonical URL of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c> that the project is connected to, according to SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: 项目根据 SharePoint 连接到的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c> 的规范 URL。

trans-unit.source: May be the same as the SiteUrl if that site is WebRoot of its site collection.
trans-unit.target: 可能是 SiteUrl 相同，如果该站点 WebRoot 其站点集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the canonical URL of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that the project is connected to, according to SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: 返回项目根据 SharePoint 连接到的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> 的规范 URL。

trans-unit.source: The canonical URL of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that the project is connected to, according to SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: 项目根据 SharePoint 连接到的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> 的规范 URL。

trans-unit.source: This may or may not be identical to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProject.SiteUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, but they point to the same resource.
trans-unit.target: 这可能或可能不能与相同<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProject.SiteUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，但它们指向相同的资源。

trans-unit.source: This value is queried from SharePoint so that it is consistent with SiteCollectionUrl.
trans-unit.target: 此值将从 SharePoint 查询，以便与 SiteCollectionUrl 一致。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProject.SiteUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> may be http://localhost, but SharePoint will resolve it to http://hostname.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProject.SiteUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>可能 http://localhost，但 SharePoint 将将其解析为 http://hostname。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access to the start mode the reason why deployment was initiated.
trans-unit.target: 为访问启动模式获取启动部署的原因。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a SharePoint project.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 SharePoint 项目的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the root URL of the SPWebApplication.
trans-unit.target: 返回 SPWebApplication 的根 URL。

trans-unit.source: The root URL of the SPWebApplication.
trans-unit.target: SPWebApplication 的根 URL。
